name: Sol Runner
description:
*Note* Highly recommended to use a mouse and play in fullscreen!

Swing and jump from building tops to clean solar panels, but watch out for wind turbine blades!

Controls:

  • Run: A/D or Left/Right
  • Jump: W/Space or Up
  • Grappling Hook: Hold Left Mouse Button

Made by:

  • Marshall Couch - Audio, Graphics, Programming
  • Kevin Smith - Graphics, Programming

Tools Used:

  • Godot Engine v3.3.4.stable.official
  • Inkscape 0.92
  • Gimp 2.10.18
  • Kubuntu 20.04
  • Windows 10
  • FL Studio

Source code: https://github.com/kevinms/godot-wild-jam-38
